pages.text: Runeboosters are Scalar Utils 5's alternatives to elevators, that allow you to float for a set amount of time in the air, usually going up at a rate of 1 block/sec.
Above are the crafting recipes to acquire a Basic Runebooster and an Advanced Runebooster.
Above are the crafting recipes to acquire an Elite Runebooster and an Ultimate Runebooster.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Transcendent Runebooster.
